channel.title: Troubleshooting on T2S
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on T2S

item.title: Manufacturers Restriction
item.description: Issue Description In order to extend the battery life of their products, manufacturers destructively restrict apps background functions. If the following error occurs frequently, it is probably caused by this reason. App automatically closes during background playback An error message shows: speech engine error or speech engine no response After the screen is off, the speech is paused or intermittently Solution Please visit dontkillmyapp.

item.title: Issues with old version of the Google Speech Service
item.description: This issue has been resolved in the new version of Google speech service, please use latest version of Google speech service. If you previously uncheck automatic updates Open play store page of Google Speech Service via this link, or search "Speech Services by Google" in Google Play. Re-check it
